Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/79th
ShortDescription: Southbound 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 79th, Western, 83rd, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 79th, Western, 83rd, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/79th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
